title: $20 RED iPhone Skin vs $750 RED iPhone 7
description: The RED iPhone 7 is cool but how does a $20 skin stack up?  The Galaxy S8 - What Samsung Didn't Tell You :o   Colorware iPhone & Google Pixel Skins:   Unboxing The RED iPhone :o  Danny's Black and Red iPhone 7!   The $2,000 Desk Setup!   Add me on Snapchat!
